enhanced_description: Atmoz HRMS is a Human Capital Management (HCM) and Human Resource Management System (HRMS) solution developed by Contrarian Ventures LLP. Launched in 2015, Atmoz HRMS serves over 300 corporate clients across a broad geographical footprint including India, UAE, Nepal, Bangladesh, USA, and UK. The company is ISO 9001:2015 certified for quality management and ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certified for information security, underscoring its commitment to high standards in quality and data protection.
